Geometry API: Turbine geometry processorÔÉÅ

Module containing the processing functions for the geometry data.

class owimetadatabase_preprocessor.geometry.processing.OWT(api, materials: DataFrame, subassemblies: DataFrame, location: DataFrame, tower_base: float, pile_head: float)ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

__init__(api, materials: DataFrame, subassemblies: DataFrame, location: DataFrame, tower_base: float, pile_head: float) → NoneÔÉÅ

Get all subassemblies for a given Turbine.

Parameters:

  • subassemblies ‚Äì Pandas dataframe with the subassemblies data for a given turbine.

  • tower_base ‚Äì Elevation of the OWT tower base in mLAT.

  • pile_head ‚Äì Elevation of the pile head in mLAT.

Returns:

_set_members() → NoneÔÉÅ

Identify and stores in separate data frames each part of the support structure (tower=TW, transition piece=TP, monopile=MP).

_set_subassemblies(subassemblies: DataFrame) → NoneÔÉÅ

Create a dictionary containing the subassemblies of the OWT.

assembly_tp_mp() → NoneÔÉÅ

Process TP structural item to assembly with MP foundation ensuring continuity. TP skirt is processed as well.

Returns:

static can_adjust_properties(row: Series) → SeriesÔÉÅ

Recalculation of can properties based on section properties and can elevations: height [m], volume [m3], mass [t], rho [t/m].

Parameters:

row ‚Äì Original can properties.

Returns:

Recalculated can properties.

can_modification(df: DataFrame, altitude: float64, position: str = 'bottom') → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Change can properties based on the altitude.

Parameters:

  • df ‚Äì Dataframe containing the can properties.

  • altitude ‚Äì Altitude in mLAT.

  • position ‚Äì Position of the can with respect to the altitude with possible values: ‚Äúbottom‚Äù or ‚Äútop‚Äù.

Returns:

Dataframe with the modified can properties.

get_monopile_pyles(projectsite: str, assetlocation: str, cutoff_point: float64 = nan) → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Returns a dataframe with the monopile geometry with the mudline as reference

Parameters:

  • projectsite ‚Äì Title of the projectsite.

  • assetlocation ‚Äì Title of the turbine.

Returns:

Dataframe with the monopile geometry.

process_distributed_lumped_masses(idx: str) → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Create dataframe containing the required properties to model uniformly distributed appurtenances. Note that if the preprocessor package does not find any appurtenances it‚Äôll return an empty dataframe.

Parameters:

idx ‚Äì Index to identify corresponding subassembly with possible values: ‚ÄòTP‚Äô, ‚ÄòMP‚Äô.

Returns:

Dataframe.

process_lumped_masses(idx: str) → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Create dataframe containing the required properties to model lumped mass appurtenances. Note that if the preprocessor package does not find any appurtenances it‚Äôll return an empty dataframe.

Parameters:

idx ‚Äì Index to identify corresponding subassembly with possible values: ‚ÄòTW‚Äô, ‚ÄòTP‚Äô, ‚ÄòMP‚Äô.

Returns:

Dataframe.

process_rna() → NoneÔÉÅ

Set dataframe containing the required properties to model the RNA system.

Returns:

process_structure(option='full') → NoneÔÉÅ

Set dataframe containing the required properties to model the tower geometry, including the RNA system.

Parameters:

option ‚Äì

Option to process the data for a specific subassembly. Possible values:

  • ‚Äùfull‚Äù: To process all the data for all subassemblies.

  • ‚Äùtower‚Äù: To process only the data for the tower subassembly.

  • ‚ÄùTP‚Äù: To process only the data for the transition piece subassembly.

  • ‚Äùmonopile‚Äù: To process only the data for the monopile foundation subassembly.

Returns:

process_structure_geometry(idx: str) → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Calculate and/or converts geometrical data of subassemblies from the database to use as input for FE models.

Parameters:

idx ‚Äì Possible index to identify corresponding subassembly.

Returns:

Dataframe consisting of the required data to build FE models.

set_df_appurtenances(idx: str) → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Set dataframe containing the required properties to model concentrated masses from database subassemblies.

Parameters:

idx ‚Äì Index to identify corresponding subassembly with possible values: ‚ÄòTW‚Äô, ‚ÄòTP‚Äô, ‚ÄòMP‚Äô.

Returns:

Data frame containing lumped masses data from database with Z coordinates in mLAT system.

set_df_distributed_appurtenances(idx: str) → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Set dataframe containing the required properties to model distributed lumped masses from database.

Parameters:

idx ‚Äì Index to identify corresponding subassembly with possible values: ‚ÄòTW‚Äô, ‚ÄòTP‚Äô, ‚ÄòMP‚Äô.

Returns:

Dataframe containing distributed lumped masses data from database. Z coordinates in mLAT system.

set_df_structure(idx: str) → DataFrameÔÉÅ

Calculate and/or converts geometrical data of subassemblies from the database.

Parameters:

idx ‚Äì Possible index to identify corresponding subassembly.

Returns:

Data frame containing geometry data from database wth z in mLAT system.
